name: SASS Custom Fields
description: 21 custom fields for Short Self Assessment Survey form

fields.name: q01_board_established
fields.label: A Board of Directors has been established with at least three individuals on it. The members are not related to each other.

fields.name: q02_members_elect
fields.label: The organization has "Members" who elect the Board of Directors.

fields.name: q03_board_committees
fields.label: The Board establishes and utilizes the help of committees when needed.

fields.name: q04_legal_compliance
fields.label: The Board has reviewed the legal requirements for not-for-profit organizations (Ontario Not-for-profit Corporations Act for provincially registered, CRA/Income Tax Act for federally registered) and are in compliance or working toward it.

fields.name: q05_governance_documents
fields.label: Board governance documents and policies are in place and kept on record. This includes By-laws, Articles (Letters Patent), Committee structures/roles/terms of reference, meeting Minutes (record of decisions), conflict of interest.

fields.name: q06_mission_vision
fields.label: There are clear and succinct Vision, Mission (Mandate) statements that accurately describe what your organization strives for and does, or plans to do.

fields.name: q07_unique_services
fields.label: There is no other organization, in your community, that offers the same services.

fields.name: q08_strategic_plan
fields.label: There is a set of up to 6 strategic goals (Strategic Plan) updated no more than four years ago.

fields.name: q09_annual_plan
fields.label: There is an annual plan of activities, based on/reflecting the strategic goals (Strategic Plan) of the organization. The plan includes both an identification of who is doing (responsible for) what, as well as measurable goals. The Board reviews the progress on this plan at least twice per year.

fields.name: q10_board_effectiveness
fields.label: The Board works effectively, makes timely decisions, and positively supports the goals of the organization.

fields.name: q11_financial_records
fields.label: There is a record of all income and expenditures, and these are regularly reviewed and 'accepted' by the Board of Directors.

fields.name: q12_bank_account
fields.label: There is a separate bank account for the organization and bank statements are reviewed at least quarterly by the Board of Directors.

fields.name: q13_budget_planning
fields.label: The annual plan of activities includes budget information if money is going to be raised or spent.

fields.name: q14_financial_reporting
fields.label: Where relevant any financial reporting to CRA (Canada Revenue Agency) or any other funders is done on-time, accurately, and is reviewed and approved by the Board.

fields.name: q15_donation_management
fields.label: If and when donations are received, they are recorded, and all donors receive appropriate acknowledgement.

fields.name: q16_volunteer_involvement
fields.label: Volunteers are involved in the organization apart from Board members.

fields.name: q17_volunteer_selection
fields.label: Volunteers are interviewed and selected for suitability for the work they will be doing (even if very briefly) and a record kept confirming this process with their name, contact information and what they will be doing.

fields.name: q18_volunteer_screening
fields.label: If a volunteer will have access to money or vulnerable people (seniors, children) they are appropriately screened.

fields.name: q19_volunteer_guidelines
fields.label: Every volunteer receives a written outline of the tasks they will be taking on, the time commitment/term and who is 'in charge' (for questions and guidance).

fields.name: q20_client_involvement
fields.label: Individuals representing the client group served by the organization have the opportunity to contribute and/or be a volunteer.

fields.name: q21_communication_guidelines
fields.label: There are guidelines on who may speak for the organization as well as for use of social media to share information.
